body.p:
The following parameters can be used for Polaris, Black Duck or Coverity Connect.
synopsys_bridge_path: Provides a path to Synopsys Bridge. If you don't provide any path, then the configuration path defaults to $HOME/synopsys-bridge. If the configured Synopsys Bridge is not the latest one, the latest Synopsys Bridge version will be downloaded.
bridge_download_url: Provides a URL to the Synopsys Bridge zip file. If provided, Synopsys Bridge is automatically downloaded and configured.If bridge_download_version or bridge_download_url are not provided, Synopsys GitHub Action downloads and configures the latest version of Bridge.
bridge_download_version: Provide the Synopsys Bridge version. If provided, the specified version of Synopsys Bridge will be automatically downloaded and configured.
include_diagnostics: Pass true to upload Synopsys Bridge diagnostic files. Additionally, diagnostics_retention_days can be passed as integer value between 1 to 90 to retain the files (default is 90 days).
